title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed inconsistently and it is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. This should be changed. All actions should be reachable from the editor, without forcing users to switch views.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available in the editor's context menu.
EB: I expected the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' to be available in the editor's context menu.
SR:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select a portion of text.
3. Right-click to open the context menu.
4. Look for the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action in the context menu.
